languages.text: "Ты — древний кошмар, явившийся из забытого прошлого..." {n}Ирлиэт сбивается с дыхания, во все глаза оглядывая существо напротив вас.{/n} "Я встречала подобных тебе, огир — один раз. И я сделаю с тобой то же, что сделала с ними — отправлю тебя в недра твоей могилы".

"You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she stares wide-eyed at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to you as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."
languages.original_text: "Ты — древний кошмар, явившийся из забытого прошлого..." {n}Ирлиэт сбивается с дыхания, во все глаза оглядывая существо напротив вас.{/n} "Я встречала подобных тебе, огир — один раз. И я сделаю с тобой то же, что сделала с ними — отправлю тебя в недра твоей могилы".

"You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she glares at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once. And I will do to you what I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."

"You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she gapes at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."

"You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she gapes at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."

"You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she stares wide-eyed at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to you as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."

"You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she stares wide-eyed at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to you as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."

languages.text: «Eres una pesadilla ancestral de un pasado olvidado...». {n}La respiración de Yrliet se acelera al mirar ojiplática a la criatura que tenéis delante.{/n} «Me he encontrado con otros como tú, Oghyr. Una sola vez. Haré contigo lo que hice entonces: devolverte a las profundidades de tu tumba».
languages.original_text: "You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she stares wide-eyed at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to you as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."

traits.locale_text: «Eres una pesadilla ancestral de un pasado olvidado...». {n}La respiración de Yrliet se acelera al mirar a la criatura que tenéis delante.{/n} «Me he encontrado con otros como tú, Oghyr. Una sola vez. Haré contigo lo que hice entonces: devolverte a las profundidades de tu tumba».

languages.text: {n}Le souffle saccadé, Yrliet observe la créature qui vous fait face d'un air stupéfait.{/n} « Vous êtes un cauchemar venu d'un lointain passé oublié... J'ai rencontré d'autres Oghyrs comme vous à une occasion et je vous ferai subir le même sort : je vous renverrai dans les profondeurs de votre tombeau. »
languages.original_text: "You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she stares wide-eyed at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to you as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le souffle saccadé, Yrliet observe la créature qui vous fait face d'un air stupéfait.{/n} « Vous êtes un cauchemar venu d'un lointain passé oublié... J'ai rencontré d'autres Oghyrs comme vous à une occasion et je vous ferai subir le même sort : je vous renverrai dans les profondeurs de votre tombeau. »

languages.text: 「お前は長らく忘れられし過去の、古の悪夢…」{n}ユリエットの呼吸が荒くなり、あなたに対峙する存在を目を見開いて見つめる。{/n}「我はお前の同類と相まみえたことがある、オフィア。かつて一度だけ。そして、今回も彼らにしたと同じことををするだろう。お前をその墳墓の深淵へと送り返してやる」
languages.original_text: "You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she stares wide-eyed at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to you as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は長らく忘れられし過去の、古の悪夢…」{n}ユリエットの呼吸が荒くなり、あなたに対峙する存在を目を見開いて見つめる。{/n}「我はお前の同類と相まみえたことがある、オフィア。かつて一度だけ。そして、今回も彼らにしたと同じことををするだろう。お前をその墳墓の深淵へと送り返してやる」

languages.text: “你是来自远古的梦魇，来自早已被遗忘的过去……”{n}伊莉耶特的呼吸变得有些惊慌。她瞪大了眼睛，看着你对面的生物。{/n}“我曾遇到过像你这样的生物，遗落者。遇到过一次，也打败过一次。而这次，我要做的事情也一样：我要把你送回你的坟墓深处。”
languages.original_text: "You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she stares wide-eyed at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to you as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."

traits.locale_text: “你是来自远古的梦魇，来自早已被遗忘的过去……”{n}伊莉耶特的呼吸变得有些惊慌。她瞪大了眼睛，看着你对面的生物。{/n}“我曾遇到过像你这样的生物，遗落者。遇到过一次，也打败过一次。而这次，我要做的事情也一样：我要把你送回你的坟墓深处。”

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein uralter Albtraum aus einer längst vergessenen Vergangenheit ..." {n}Yrliet beginnt unregelmäßig zu atmen, als sie das Wesen vor euch mit weit aufgerissenen Augen anstarrt.{/n} "Ich bin schon anderen wie Euch begegnet, Oghyr. Einmal. Und ich werde mit Euch tun, was ich mit ihnen getan habe: Euch in die Tiefen Eures Grabs schicken."
languages.original_text: "You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she stares wide-eyed at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to you as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein uralter Albtraum aus einer längst vergessenen Vergangenheit ..." {n}Yrliets beginnt unregelmäßig zu atmen, als sie das Wesen vor euch anstarrt.{/n} "Ich bin schon anderen wie Euch begegnet, Oghyr. Einmal. Und ich werde mit Euch tun, was ich mit ihnen getan habe: Euch in die Tiefen Eures Grabs schicken."

languages.text: "Sen uzun zaman önce unutulmuş bir geçmişten gelen, kadim bir kâbussun." {n}Karşındaki varlığa kocaman gözlerle bakan Yrliet'in nefes alıp verişi düzensizleşiyor.{/n} "Senin gibilerle daha önce karşılaştım Oghyr. Bir kez. Onlara yaptığımı tekrarlayacağım: Seni kabrinin derinliklerine göndereceğim."
languages.original_text: "You are an ancient nightmare from a long-forgotten past..." {n}Yrliet's breathing becomes unsteady as she stares wide-eyed at the being opposite you.{/n} "I have encountered others like you, Oghyr. Once before. And I will do to you as I did to them: send you to the depths of your tomb."
